In A Mood?

When tough times made their rounds, I've always immeresed myself into those classic inspirational videos or thoughtfully written quotes. I found them helpful seeing that they can rapidly change your perspective; more so in aspects that sometimes take a lifetime to grasp.

Here is an Anime, Kanye, "Old Head" inspired quote api that generates some of the most heart-warming, but hard-bitten quotes - voiced by the most iconic. I hope you enjoy, and can replenish yourself through both inspiration and motivation.

"Even when you're fed up, you've got to keep your head up." - Tupac Shakur

By clicking the button in the according section, you will generate a new quote at random.

And today's quote of the day is ~ "Pain can only be understood by people who have shared the same pain" - Yahiko from Naruto Shippuden

Kanye West

"I am the number one most impactful artist of our generation, in the flesh. I am Shakespeare, Walt Disney." - Kanye West

Kanye West has always had an inspiration on me. The biggest reason, he is him-self, meaning he does what he wabnts regardless of others opinions. He has made it out of poverty and is doing his best to support people who want to be helped.

Anime

"I will be hokage, everyone will ahve to stop disrespecting me and look up to me. Believe it!!" - Naruto Uzumaki

Anime has alwasy been there for me, whne times where dark and lonely. Growing up alone and in foster homes, anime is what ekp me up. In foster homes no one spoke to me, I felkt like i was a in a asylum, but with anime i felt like whole again.
